channel.title: shelly sensor on Shelly CLI
channel.description: Recent content in shelly sensor on Shelly CLI

item.title: shelly sensor devicepower
item.description:
shelly sensor devicepower

Manage device power sensors

Synopsis

Manage device power sensors on Shelly devices.

Device power sensors provide battery and external power status for battery-powered Shelly devices (Plus HT, H&T, etc.).

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly sensor - Manage device sensors
  • shelly sensor devicepower list - List devicepower sensors
  • shelly sensor devicepower status - Get devicepower sensor status

item.description:

Synopsis

item.title: shelly sensor flood
item.description:
shelly sensor flood

Manage flood sensors

Synopsis

Manage flood (water leak) sensors on Shelly devices.

Flood sensors detect water leaks and can trigger alarms with different modes: disabled, normal, intense, or rain detection.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly sensor - Manage device sensors
  • shelly sensor flood list - List flood sensors
  • shelly sensor flood status - Get flood sensor status
  • shelly sensor flood test - Test flood sensor

item.description:
shelly sensor flood list

SEE ALSO

  • shelly sensor flood - Manage flood sensors

item.title: shelly sensor flood test
item.description:
shelly sensor flood test

Test flood sensor

Synopsis

Test the flood sensor on a Shelly device.

Note: The Flood component may not have a dedicated test method. This command provides instructions for manual testing.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly sensor flood - Manage flood sensors

item.title: shelly sensor illuminance
item.description:
shelly sensor illuminance

Manage illuminance sensors

Synopsis

Illuminance sensors provide light level readings in lux, useful for automation based on ambient light conditions.

item.title: shelly sensor smoke
item.description:
shelly sensor smoke

Manage smoke sensors

Synopsis

Manage smoke detection sensors on Shelly devices.

Smoke sensors provide alarm state detection and the ability to mute active alarms.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly sensor - Manage device sensors
  • shelly sensor smoke list - List smoke sensors

item.title: shelly sensor smoke mute
item.description:
shelly sensor smoke mute

Mute smoke alarm

Synopsis

Mute an active smoke alarm.

The alarm will remain muted until the condition clears and potentially re-triggers.

Examples

SEE ALSO

item.title: shelly sensor status
item.description:
shelly sensor status

Show all sensor readings

Synopsis

Show all sensor readings from a Shelly device.

Displays a combined view of all available sensors including:

  • Temperature (C/F)
  • Humidity (%)
  • Flood detection status
  • Smoke detection status
  • Illuminance (lux)
  • Voltage readings

Only sensors present on the device will be shown.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly sensor - Manage device sensors

item.title: shelly sensor temperature
item.description:
shelly sensor temperature

Manage temperature sensors

Synopsis

Manage temperature sensors on Shelly devices.

Temperature sensors can be built-in or external (DS18B20). Readings are provided in both Celsius and Fahrenheit.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly sensor - Manage device sensors
  • shelly sensor temperature list - List temperature sensors
  • shelly sensor temperature status - Get temperature sensor status
